sentence: The latest tally of analyst opinions from the major brokerage houses shows that among the 30 stocks making up the Dow Jones Industrial Average, Procter & Gamble ( PG ) is the #13 analyst pick.
Procter & Gamble also comes in above the median of analyst picks among the broader S&P 500 index components, claiming the #235 spot out of 500.
Looking at the stock price movement year to date, Procter & Gamble ( PG ) is lower by about 2.1%.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
